problem_text_cn: 如图矩形ABCD中,点E是边AD的中点,FE交对角线AC于点F,若△AFE的面积为2,则△BCF的面积等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the rectangle ABCD, point E is the midpoint of edge AD, and FE intersects the diagonal AC at point F. If the area of △AFE is N_0, then the area of △BCF is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是矩形,∴AD=BC,AD∥BC,∵点E是边AD的中点,∴BC=AD=2AE,∵AD∥BC,∴△AFE∽△CFB,∴\frac{S_{△AFE}}{S_{△BCF}}=(\frac{AE}{BC})²=(\frac{AE}}{2AE})²=\frac{1}{4}．∵△AFE的面积为2,∴△BCF的面积为8故选:A．
